Control Name: Evaluates the Effectiveness of Incident Response—The design of incident response activities is evaluated for effectiveness on a periodic basis.

control_attributes.Control: Evaluates the Effectiveness of Incident Response—The design of incident response activities is evaluated for effectiveness on a periodic basis.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.4 The entity responds to identified security incidents by executing a defined incident response program to understand, contain, remediate, and communicate security incidents, as appropriate.
